## Source: ossf-package-analysis (16297b3163e4c4992c5f935c4d595a2de48dfbe42ff4bb55fb7c15d1f7e6dd6b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'android-mobile-agent' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
